name: Clockwork (itch) (Bluebell Studios, ChickenHatMan)
description:
Clockwork is a top-down roguelike action game, in which every 90 seconds, your inventory is wiped. Gather items from slain enemies to refine your loadout and challenge the final boss to win.

Features

  • 10 Weapons
  • 30 Passive Items
  • Procedural level generation
  • 50 Unique room layouts
  • 6 enemy types
  • Controller support
  • Various gameplay affecting options
